ygData.subject: RE: Practice Research
ygData.msgSnippet: Its broke.  Ya, plain and simple.  Verant made this big deal, you have this quest  (IE kill something and give its remains to someone), get your practice
ygData.messageBody:
Its broke. Ya, plain and simple. Verant made this big deal, you have
this "quest" (IE kill something and give its remains to someone), get
your practice book. Well, they checked that, but never (it seems)
tested if you could actually combine the items. No matter what you do,
you wont get a practice rune. I too had a hard time beliving that
Verant wouldn't have at least tried this ONCE to see, so I messaged a
gm. After trying for days, I finally got a reply that yes, its broken.
I also saw a message to that affect on Graffe's web page. *sigh*

Micon Bittermage
Karana
